abstract.t: This document describes a methodology specific to the benchmarking of MPLS forwarding devices, limited to various types of packet- forwarding and delay measurements. It builds upon the tenets set forth in RFC2544 [RFC2544], RFC1242 [RFC1242] and other IETF Benchmarking Methodology Working Group (BMWG) efforts. This document seeks to extend these efforts to the MPLS paradigm.
